name: pebble_auto_config
description: PAC is a simple configuration page for pebble watchface configuration. PAC uses url parameters to create a config page on the fly using JS.

scripts.package: npm run copy:all && npm run package:css && npm run package:js
scripts.package:css: npm run combine:css && npm run uncss && npm run copy:css
scripts.copy:all: npm run copy:bootstrap && npm run copy:jquery

author: Greg Thoman
